summary: Andy, a hyperactive compulsive gambler, has just been given one hour to live before a hit eliminates him for overdue gambling debts. With the deadline looming, Andy chooses to spend his last hour in more than one unusual way.
cast: Randy Quaid|Jay Baruchel|Jayne Eastwood|Lucy Filippone|Jeff Pustil|Ella Chan|Jeff Teravainen
keywords: cell phone|compulsive gambler|memory|urination|punched in the nose
title: Real Time
